overview: The story begins with a group of friends: Sridhar, Chandana, Nandini , Mahesh, Bhakti, Jessica, Kishore, Scud.  Each of them have their own stories and in between that is the unexpressed love track of Sri and Chandana, Bhakti and Mahesh, Nandini is in love with Kishore. They all finish their college exams and are all set to take on the life with full energy, but then life has its own twists and turns for them and this in turn gives them an experience which is unforgettable and memorable.
title: Thakita Thakita

overview: Vasu is a forest officer who falls in love with the tribal girl, Indu. As time passes, Indu also loves Vasu. As things are going fine, One fine day, Indu gets killed and she becomes a ghost. Vasu must find out what happened.
title: Induvadana

overview: Possessed by Devi Maa, a blessed woman predicts her own death, leaving her shattered family to deal with a look-alike.
title: Panchakshari

overview: Ganesh, an unemployed man, lands up in a company where Keerthi, the girl he loves, works but who is already engaged to someone else. Sudden incidents ruin his life and he again comes across her, but refuses to marry her.
title: Aadavari Matalaku Ardhalu Verule

overview: Shankar Dada is a local goon who sets out to fulfill his parents' dream of him being a doctor. With help from his sidekick ATM, he enrolls himself in medical college and drives the principal and his daughter Dr. Sunitha up the wall.
title: Shankar Dada MBBS

overview: Pedarayudu, the eldest brother, sits on an ancestral throne that is cursed and whoever delivers a wrong verdict dies. However, things take a turn after his youngest brother is accused of murder.
title: Pedarayudu

overview: An anthology of 4 stories of people struggling to make their lives better and how those plans are thrown into disarray when a politician decides to divert welfare funds to satiate his ego.
title: Johaar

overview: Krishna, who lives in Dubai, falls in love with Sneha. He comes to India to seek the blessings of his grandmother, unaware that don Jeetendra's gang is seeking revenge.
title: Legend

overview: Bhadra(Telugu: భద్ర) is a Telugu film released on 12 May 2005 ( Dubbed in malayalam as Brahmam ) and was directed by debutant director Boyapati Srinu. Ravi Teja and Meera Jasmine played the lead roles. The film was later remade into Tamil as Saravana with Silambarasan and Jyothikaand also remade into bengali as Josh with Jeet and Srabonti. Linda Arsenio danced in an item number.
title: Bhadra

overview: A business tycoon decides to adopt a stranger after he saves her life when someone tries to kill her. It turns out, the stranger has a murky past and while she tries everything she can to save him from it, fate brings him at crossroads with his past life.
title: Ruler

overview: The life story of Sri Krishna.
title: Sri Krishnavataram

overview: The sudden demise of the celebrated leader PKR leaves the ruling party in a political crisis and shakes up the family. The party has to elect a leader, and more than one player is in contention. Everyone’s intentions are blurred, and loyalties are in question. Brahma is a game changer in this squabble. Who will succeed as the leader and become the CM?
title: GodFather

overview: An audio company and dance school owner is a very rich man but also gullible. He gets married to the girl he loves; but loses all his money to his scheming friends. They lose their daughter to a heart disease following which his wife leaves him.
title: Daddy

overview: A ruthless billionaire, Neeraj, uses beggars as benamis to launder money, with the help of a disgraced civil submit servant, Deepak. One of the beggars, Deva, escapes with ₹10,000 crores and becomes the target of a deadly manhunt. He meets Sameera, who joins him in his mission to use the money to uplift society's poor. With Deepak's help, Deva fights back.
title: Kuberaa

overview: Nuvve Kavali (Telugu: నువ్వే కావాలి) (English translation I Want Only You) is a 2000 blockbuster Telugu film under Ushakiron Movies, directed by K. Vijaya Bhaskar of Swayamvaram fame. Tarun and Richa Pallod debuted with this film. In many ways the film became a catalyst for new trends in Tollywood. This movie was a remake of Malayalam Blockbuster Niram.
title: Nuvve Kavali

overview: Set in the late 1980s Kuppam, Subramanyam, a talented lab assistant, becomes a gunsmith as life throws curveballs after he gets embroiled in a college incident, turns out to be the savior of the locals.
title: Harom Hara

overview: Jonnalagadda Sreenivasa Rao directs this film produced by Ramoji Rao under Ushakiran Movies starring Sai Kiran, Jennifer & Sivaji in the lead roles. Shiva Shankar has scored the music on the lyrics of Sri
title: Manasunte Chalu

overview: Sandeep and Shruti, who got married a year ago, are living a very happy life. News of Shruti's death comes as a shock to Navadeep on the day of the wedding anniversary. Upon learning of the matter, the policemen start the interrogation. They discover that it is not Suicide but Murder. It is suspected that Shruti's husband Sandeep had killed her. Sandeep escapes from the police and begins searching for his wife. Who killed the chord? Sandeep, what is the story of the third person in Shruti Life? Who needs to kill Shruti?
title: Run

overview: Two children whose parents are about to get divorced visit seven holy shrines at their grandmother's behest who believes the gods are angry with her because she did not fulfill her promise.
title: Devullu

overview: Unable to tolerate the worries of the villagers, Raja takes aid of a fairy tale hero 'Kondaveeti Donga', transforms himself into one and sets out to save the people from an evil hypnotizer Kadra.
title: Kondaveeti Donga

overview: A billionaire Govinda Bhargav and his son are murdered with the aim of a hostile takeover of their company. But what his enemies do not know is that he has an heir that no one knows of.
title: Agnyaathavaasi

overview: Rambabu, a cable operator, lives with his beloved wife Jyothi and two daughters. One day, his family inadvertently gets involved in a grave crime and he must go to great lengths to protect them.
title: Drushyam

overview: A young filmmaker is in a soup right when he’s about to find his footing in the film industry. When he sets out to find an answer, turns out it’s in the past.
title: Shyam Singha Roy

overview: An impulsive youngster, who is furious with his mother, seeks assistance from a scientist for a way to become an adult overnight. His wish is granted and he begins look like a 28-year-old man. How will he deal with the complexities of adulthood? How will his relationship with his mother evolve?
title: Naani

overview: Bharathi's parents refuse to accept her after discovering that she is pregnant with Suresh's child, the man who cheated her.
title: Nyayam Kavali

overview: A lorry driver saves a woman from an accident but she loses her memory and he brings her home. They get married and have a child but her parents discover the truth and decide to take her home.
title: Maa Ayana Bangaram

overview: A determined lawyer takes on a high-stakes case to defend a 19-year-old boy, challenging a system that has already branded him guilty.
title: Court: State vs. A Nobody

overview: Bujji runs away from his home in his childhood because of a dispute with his girlfriend Chitti. He ends up in Chennai for 12 years, and the rest of the story is about how they meet now to make their love successful.
title: Bujjigaadu: Made in Chennai

overview: Three girls find themselves accused of attempt to murder after escaping molestation. Their only hope is an alcoholic lawyer who agrees to take up the case.
title: Vakeel Saab

overview: Karthik hails from Rayalaseema and is doing well in his career as a project lead in an IT company. Wanting to pursue the family’s vocation of farming, he quits his job and returns back to his village. Will he be able to bring back lost glory to the profession?
title: Sreekaram

overview: CI Shivakumar,a brash police officer, handles a lot of missing cases which has caused great strain on his marriage life. After a serious accident,Shiva admits his wife Aparna and daughter Lucky in hospital, only to find them missing next day. Will Shiva solve the mystery despite suffering from a serious medical condition?
title: Ugram

overview: Narasimha is a man on the run with his one-year-old son. He reaches Kumbakonam and stays at the house of the village temple's dharma karta's house. But while there, he bumps into Gowri who seems to dislike him for some reason, despite being his childhood friend. A death row inmate Rami Reddy also seems to hold a grudge against Narasimha. Who is Narasimha and what did he do to make so many enemies?
title: Jai Simha

overview: A romantic thriller film directed by M Adi Sesha Sai Reddy, starring Sakshi Chowdary and Posani Krishna Murali in the lead roles.
title: Magnet

overview: A coming of age story of a man and a woman from diverse social backgrounds, faiths and aspirations.
title: Avakai Biryani

overview: Differently abled and single parent Veerayya, with limited financial resources embarks on an endless pursuit to make his son Raju's biggest dream of traveling on an aeroplane come true.
title: Vimanam

overview: Surya is an IT employee leading a happy life till he’s marked as a suspect in a high-profile murder case. As an under-trial prisoner, he doesn’t just have to prove his innocence in court; he also has to face abuse in custody. Advocate Aadhya takes up the case, fresh off law school. How the duo manages to navigate rough waters forms the tale.
title: Naandhi

overview: Siri and Sriram fall in love with each other and plan to get married. However, his mother disapproves of their relationship.
title: Nuvvostanante Nenoddantana

overview: To get his land from an evil landlord, Ravi impresses him with his antics. He also falls in love with Aravinda, who incidentally happens to be the landlord's granddaughter.
title: Avunanna Kadanna

overview: Four brothers live happily together as a joint family. But when misunderstandings arises between them, they need to overcome them to live happily again.
title: Ummadi Kutumbam

overview: Shankar (Nara Rohit) lives in a hostel to pursue his education. Circumstances force him into a rivalry with a police officer (John Vijay) who sabotages Shankar's life and labels him as a drug addict. How Shankar solves the problem is the crux of the story.  (Wikipedia, Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike License)
title: Shankara

overview: Chakravarthy and Sasirekha gets married. But false allegations on Chakravarthy regarding a murder creates misunderstandings between them. Their sons who are identical twins, decides to reunite their parents.
title: Koduku Diddina Kapuram

overview: Timmarusu the prime minister in Krishnadevaraya's court, is envied by Hamvira, who hopes to overthrow him. After being falsely accused of attacking the king, Timmarusu must prove his innocence.
title: Mahamantri Thimmarusu

overview: An officer investigates a series of killings, allegedly by a man-eating tiger in the forest. However, his findings reveal the truth about a sinister serial killer.
title: Anveshana

overview: A man pursuing life abroad meets a chaotic, free-spirited woman who pulls him back into filmmaking-a passion he abandoned after trauma. Through their love story, he confronts his past wounds and rediscovers his creative soul.
title: Oh Bhama Ayyo Rama

overview: A retelling of Mahabharata through the perspectives of KARNA and DURYODHANA.  The film uses dialogue and poetry written in Classical Telugu/ Grandhika Basha.
title: Daana Veera Soora Karna

overview: Rama Rao fails to get a job with the police force due to his father's connections with a gangster. But when his brother is killed by the gangster, Rama Rao becomes Baadshah to oppose him.
title: Baadshah

overview: Kalyan, a dancer, falls in love with a girl who comes to him in order to learn dancing. However, the lovers face many problems while they strive to be together.
title: Prema Yuddham

overview: An ambitious and young man named Rama Krishna avenges his sister's death after her in-laws burn her alive due to their greed for dowry. Thereafter, he starts killing every man that harasses a woman.
title: Rakhi

overview: Chattam Tho Poratam is action crime based movie in which, Ravi (Chiranjeevi), who is the son of a struggling middle class farmer Dharmarao. He loves his cousin kalyani very much, but his another cousin Bujji is also after her.Bujji tries every possible method to marry kalyani. Bujji
title: Chattam Tho Poratam

overview: PJ is the grandson of a wealthy zamindar and an irresponsible youngster who is spoilt by the pampering and excessive money. His grandfather writes a will with several conditions before he dies. He writes the will that PJ will inherit his entire wealth only if he completes his graduation as a common man without any luxeries. The rest of the story is all about how PJ learns about values and life as he achieves his goal.
title: Pilla Zamindar

overview: A charismatic playboy's life takes an unexpected turn when a young boy enters his world. Initially causing chaos, the boy gradually becomes an integral part of their lives.
title: Manamey

overview: Set in an engineering college and revolves around the antics of the students there, primarily the boys, who get a kick out of torturing the hostel warden.
title: MAD

overview: 'Astram' is the remake of hindi movie 'Sarfarosh' which starred Aamir Khan in lead. The movie was a hit at that time. Suresh Krishna has tried to match the present cast with that of the original. His selection of script is an upset to the audience. He has selected Vishnu in lead but failed to have actual grip on the movie.  Vishnu has performed well as a responsible IPS officer. This can be stated as his best job till now. The guy has a long way to go. Anushka, as Vishnu's ladylove, adds glamour to the movie. Though Jackie Shroff's role is short, his performance is fine. The technical aspects of the movie are pass muster. Music by S.A.Rajkumar is a mediocre. Suresh Krishna's direction, screenplay are okay.
title: Asthram

overview: Ram Murthy is a retired headmaster who does not tolerate mistakes and threatens to banish any family member who makes more than a 100 mistakes. His youngest son Sundeep, who has racked up a score of 99, gets separated from his family when he misses the Venkatadri Express to Tirupati on the way to his brother's wedding. How can he catch up with the train to cover up his mistake and avoid being banished?
title: Venkatadri Express

overview: The story revolves around a sheep that becomes entangled in a conflict between two communities, with an underlying religious tension.
title: Gorre Puranam

overview: A thief saves a beautiful princess from the clutches of an evil minister who has his eyes on her. After he saves her, they both fall in love but face many obstacles on their way.
title: Banda Ramudu

overview: When a passionate classical dancer, Balakrishna, falls in love with Madhavi, a woman who admires his talent, fate separates them. Years later, as he drowns in sorrow and self-destruction, an unexpected encounter rekindles his lost hopes, emotions and talent.
title: Sagara Sangamam

overview: A man with dissociative identity disorder takes revenge on four businessmen for the murder of his family.
title: Amar Akbar Anthony

overview: Bheeshma Prasad, a simple meme creator has his life turned around when he wages a war against a powerful agro company that creates harmful chemicals to increase the crop yield and make more money.
title: Bheeshma

overview: George Reddy is a biopic based on the life of a student leader, boxer and Gold medalist, who influenced the politics of Andhra Pradesh state in Osmania University between 1967 and 1972. He is often remembered for inspiring revolutionary thoughts until he was brutally murdered at his hostel in 1972.
title: George Reddy

overview: Jeeva  is an engineering graduate with loving parents who seem to have an obsession with the retro era. The girl he falls in love with, Jo, lives with her sister's family. But what happens when their lives start mirroring with another couple's?
title: Okka Kshanam

overview: Abhi is all set to be engaged to Pooja, a girl he’s slowly falling for. But in walks into his life his ex-girlfriend Suryakantham like the hurricane that she is. Stuck between both, Abhi struggles to find some way to resolve the situation peacefully.
title: Suryakantham

overview: An intelligent young man and a timid cop team up to catch a criminal who wants revenge after a foiled bank robbery.
title: Julayi

overview: A young couple navigates through the highs and lows of a budding relationship.
title: Padi Padi Leche Manasu

overview: Nikhil Siddharth and Swathi Reddy are back once again onscreen with Karthikeya. The mystery of the Subramanian Swamy temple which has remained closed for years is the crux of the movie. Local people in the village are curious why the temple has been locked up for years? The lead protagonists take the initiative to solve the mystery.
title: Karthikeya

overview: Ravi, Venkat, Balu and Venu, four unemployed graduates, waste their time in doing unconstructive things. However, their lives change when they meet Anjali, a photographer.
title: Ammayi Kosam

overview: Sita is a materialistic woman who only cares about materialistic gains and nothing else. MLA Basava Raju lusts for her and wants her to give him what she promised him for helping her. The villain of their tale is Ram, a man who’s way too innocent for his own good. How does Ram help Sita out of the fix she’s in forms the crux of the story.
title: Sita

overview: Only one man can stop a villain who, backed by his father, brutally murders anyone who gets in the way of his unscrupulous real estate deals.
title: Sarrainodu

overview: Karthik and Anjali are childhood sweethearts who fell in love when they're fourteen. Despite having immense love for each other, circumstances forced them apart many a time. Will things change when they grow older? Will their love story finally have a happy ending?
title: Malli Raava

overview: US return student Karthik pledges to marry his uncle Dhanunjay's daughter Indu, which was his mother's wish. A small family feud ends with both the families getting separated. He joins Indu's college to convince her to marry him, but mistakenly assumes Bhagyam as Dhanunjay's daughter. Later, Karthik realizes that Indu is his cousin but she is already in love with another guy. He gets entangled in a risky situation when he tries to help a stranger. The rest of the story is all about how he controls the damage and fulfills the wish of his mother.
title: Rabhasa

overview: Shankar decides to leave behind his life as a gangster and lead a normal life. However, when his brother-in-law's life is at stake, he decides to rethink his decision.
title: Lankeshwarudu

overview: When mysterious occurrences plague a closed Shiva temple at Mahendragiri, a fearless and dynamic cop Bhimaa quests to unravel and confront the sinister truth hidden in the shadows and the revelations behind strange happenings in the village, supported by spirits.
title: Bhimaa

overview: After her family gets murdered, Chitra, a lonely girl, spends a year in an asylum. She is petrified when she witnesses another murder and refuses to believe that it is her hallucination.
title: Katha

overview: A tough army major is deployed to Kurnool on a mission to keep the country safe from external threats.
title: Sarileru Neekevvaru

overview: A Telugu film directed by C. H. Subba Reddy.
title: Rough

overview: A young man plans to climb the ladder of success by trying to woo his rich uncle's daughter.
title: Premaku Velayera

overview: Rajesh falls in love with and proposes to Devi. However, a few days before their marriage, he learns that he has cancer and decides to make Devi hate him, so that she will marry another man.
title: Premabhishekam

overview: The story revolves around three young men who fall in love with a pretty older woman who had moved into their neighbourhood.
title: Aunty

overview: Based on the life of the notorious thief Nageswara Rao, who was the most wanted thief of south India& managed to evade the authorities on several occasions in the 1970s, earning him the moniker of 'Tiger.'
title: Tiger Nageswara Rao

overview: A young man faces immense pressure from his family to move to America, get a job and have his life settled abroad.
title: Pressure Cooker
